title: New: Shinies – Taste
content:
Mancunian rascals Shinies are set to release their debut EP Tangle later in the year, through Dirty Bingo, and have just released the first track to be lifted from said release.

Taste is yet another example of why they’re one of the UK’s most underrated new artists, with their cutting wit and raucous, noise-pop stylings, it’s arguably their finest outing to date. In a time when UK guitar music is pretty much flat on its arse (Palma Violets, Peace, blah you know the rest), Shinies are a twinkling star of hope. Check out Taste below, and keep your eyes peeled for their EP, out 12 August.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
